R

readBit() - Method in class IO.BinaryInput
Reads the next bit of data from the input stream.
readChar() - Method in class IO.BinaryInput
Method that returns char by reading the next 8 bits from the input stream.
readFile(String) - Method in class LZ77.LZ77Compression
Reads all chars from original file and writes them into String.
readFile(DataInputStream) - Method in class LZW.LZWDecompression
Reads chars from input stream and converts them to integer codes which get added into list for decompressing.
readFrequenciesFromFile(BinaryInput) - Method in class huffmancoding.HuffmanDecompression
Method that reads the symbols and their frequencies from input stream.
readInt(int) - Method in class IO.BinaryInput
Read the next n bits from the input stream and returns it as n-bit int.
readTree(Node, String) - Method in class huffmancoding.HuffmanCompression
Method that is used for creating the code for each character in original text.
run(String) - Method in class huffmancoding.HuffmanCompression
The main method of compressor.
run(String) - Method in class huffmancoding.HuffmanDecompression
The main method of decompressor.
